1.description: Enemies gain +4 Dex
Turn Start: Enemies heal 5 HP
Turn Start: Players take 1 HP damage
Turn Start: Draw 1 page, and restore 1 light
On Use, 50% chance not to consume light and recover hp equal to the pages light cost
+1 Power Up
On Use: If target is below 33% HP, gain 3 Fragile and inflict 2  Fragile (Max 2 times per turn)

On Hit: Inflict 1 Burn
On Hit: 50% chance to inflict +1 Burn count
On Hit: 50% chance to inflict 1 Rupture and 1 Rupture count
On Hit: 50% chance to inflict 2 Burn and 1 Burn count
On Hit: Inflict Bonus Damage equal to Rupture on target
Turn Start: Gain 1 Envy E.G.O Resource and 2 random other affinity E.G.O resources

Turn Start: Gain +1 E.G.O resource of a random affinity
If a Lust Attack Affinity was used last turn: Gain 1 of every non Lust Affinity E.G.O resource
The costs for Shop Heals, Revives and refreshes are reduced by 50%
Turn Start: Draw 1 page, gain 2 speed and gain 2 Poise and +2 Poise Count
Turn Start: If this unit has Burn, heal 5 HP
Turn Start: Gain +4 Speed

Turn Start: Deal 3 fixed Envy Affinity damage to all enemies.
Inflict 1  Power Down to enemies with 33% or less HP.

Encounter Start: Heal 15% of max HP (Max 15)

Turn Start: At 3+ Pride Resonance, this unit heals 1/6th of their max HP (Max 15)

*Applies to the #1 deployment ally*

+1 Speed Dice.
Turn Start: Draw 1 page, recover 1 light, and gain 2 Poise and +2 Poise Count.

On Hit with a Spinouse Syndicate Page: Inflict 1 rupture, 1 rupture count, 1 bleed, 1 bleed count

On Clash Win with a Spinouse Syndicate Page: Inflict 1 rupture, 1 rupture count, 1 bleed, 1 bleed count
Allows you to ignore path lines when traversing the mirror dungeon
On Kill: Gain +1 Wrath E.G.O resource and 1 random E.G.O resource of a random non Wrath Affinity

2.description: On Kill: Gain +2 Wrath E.G.O resources and 1 random E.G.O resource of a random non Wrath Affinity

3.description: On Kill: Gain +2 Wrath E.G.O resources 1 random E.G.O resource of 2 random non Wrath Affinities

1.description: On Ally Death: Gain +2 E.G.O resources for all affinities, then all allies draw 2 pages and restore 3 light
When this unit gains Ammo, gain 1 additional Ammo

On Encounter Start: Gain +5 Pride E.G.O resources
On Kill: Gain +2 Pride E.G.O resources and 1 E.G.O resource of two random non Pride sin affinities

Turn Start: Gain 2 Wrath  Power Up

Clash Win: If target has 10+ Burn, activate Burn on target, then lower targetâ€™s Burn Count by 2.

On Kill: Recover 25% of Max HP and Max ST
The first single Offensive Dice Page that an ally uses gets used one more time

Turn Start: Gain 2 Gloom Power Up, 1 Pride Power Up and 5 Sinking.

On Hit: Inflict 2 Sinking Potency.

On Tremor Burst: Inflict +2 Sinking Count and (Tremor on Target / 2) Sinking Potency (Max 5)

On Kill: Gain 3 Offense Level Up next turn.

Turn Start: For every turn that has passed without an enemy being killed by this unit, gain 1 Offense Level Up and take 1 HP damage
For every 3 hits to an enemy, gain 1 Ammo (Max two times per turn)
Turn Start: Gain 2 Lust Power Up next scene

Turn Start: Gain 4 Black Power Up next turn
Clash Win: If this Dice was Black Affinity, and the target Dice's Affinity was White, inflict 15 bonus damage and gain 2 Clash Power Up next turn

Turn Start: Gain 4 White Power Up next turn
Clash Win: If this Dice was White Affinity, and the target Dice's Affinity was Black, inflict 15 bonus damage and gain 2 Clash Power Up next turn
On Hit: This unit heals HP equal to 20% of damage dealt. If the dice used was Wrath Affinity, increase healing by an additional 25%

*Applies to the #1 deployment ally*

On Roll: Dice Power +2, but all units gain +2 Sinking and Tremor Count (Max once per turn)
Clash Win: Inflict 3 Tremor Potency to target and self, then trigger Tremor Burst on target and self (Max once per turn)

Upon being Staggered, unstagger and heal 40 HP (Max once per encounter)
On Hit with a Pierce Dice: Inflict 1 Defense Level Down next turn

Pierce Dice gain Clash Power +1
Turn Start: If this unit does not have Ammo, gain 2 Ammo next turn

If the target has Pierce Fragility, Dice Power +1.

Clash Win: 50% chance to inflict 1 Pierce Fragility this turn. 50% chance to inflict 1 Pierce Fragility next turn

Slash Dice gain Power +2 and +2 Max Dice Power
On Clash Win: If the Dice used was Slash affinity, gain 1 Haste next turn, and deal +(Speed Difference) Slash damage

Pierce Dice gain Power +2 and +2 Max Dice Power
On Clash Win: If the Dice used was Pierce affinity, gain 1 Haste next turn, and deal +(Speed Difference) Pierce damage

Blunt Dice gain Power +2 and +2 Max Dice Power
On Clash Win: If the Dice used was Blunt affinity, gain 1 Haste next turn, and deal +(Speed Difference) Blunt damage
If any unit has a 1.5 or lower Slash Resistance, change it to 1.5 (This applies to both allies and enemies)
If any unit has a 1.5 or lower Pierce Resistance, change it to 1.5 (This applies to both allies and enemies)
If any unit has a 1.5 or lower Blunt Resistance, change it to 1.5 (This applies to both allies and enemies)
All unit Physical and Sin Resistances change to 2.0 (This applies to both allies and enemies)
All allies Physical and Sin Resistances change to 0.5

Encounter Start: For every ally fielded, inflict 1 Tremor Potency and Count to all enemies.

On Hit: If the dice used was Envy Affinity, inflict 2 Tremor Potency

2.description:
Encounter Start: For every ally fielded, inflict 1 Tremor Potency and Count to all enemies.
On Hit: If the dice used was Envy Affinity, inflict 4 Tremor Potency

3.description:
Encounter Start: For every ally fielded, inflict 2 Tremor Potency and Count to all enemies.
On Hit: If the dice used was Envy Affinity, inflict 4 Tremor Potency

1.description: On Hit: If the dice used was Gluttony Affinity, or if the target is Staggered, inflict 2 Tremor Potency to 2 random enemies

2.description: On Hit: If the dice used was Gluttony Affinity, or if the target is Staggered, inflict 2 Tremor Potency to 3 random enemies

3.description: On Hit: If the dice used was Gluttony Affinity, or if the target is Staggered, inflict 4 Tremor Potency to 3 random enemies

1.description: On Clash Win: If the target does not have Tremor, inflict +3 Tremor Count

2.description: On Clash Win: If the target has less than 4 Tremor Count, inflict +4 Tremor Count

3.description: On Clash Win: If the target has less than 6 Tremor Count, inflict +4 Tremor Count

1.description: On Use: If the target has 8+ Tremor Potency, consume 2 Tremor Potency to apply 1 Attack Power Up next turn to a random ally (Max once per turn)
On Tremor Burst: Inflict 1 Bruise next turn (Max 3 times per turn)
On Tremor Burst: Inflict 1 Bruise next turn (Max 3 times per turn)
On Tremor Burst: Inflict 1 Fragile next turn (Max 3 times per turn)
Turn Start: Gain 4 Tremor Potency and Count, then trigger 1 Tremor Burst

2.description: Turn Start: Gain 4 Tremor Potency and Count, then trigger 2 Tremor Bursts

3.description: Turn Start: Gain 6 Tremor Potency and Count, then trigger 2 Tremor Bursts

1.description: Turn Start: If this unit has 8+ Charge Count, gain 1 Haste next turn

2.description: Turn Start: If this unit has 8+ Charge Count, gain 2 Haste next turn

3.description: Turn Start: If this unit has 6+ Charge Count, gain 2 Haste and 1 Power Up next turn

1.description: Turn Start: At 5+ Charge Count, and if this unit has less than 5 pages in hand, draw 2 pages
Turn Start: At less than 4+ Charge Count, gain 4 Charge Count next turn. Otherwise, gain 2 Defense Power Up next turn
After using a Combat Page: At 12+ Charge Count on self, and if this unit is below 75% HP, consume 4 Charge Count on self to heal (Charge Count Consumed * 2) HP

2.description: After using a Combat Page: At 12+ Charge Count on self, and if this unit is below 75% HP, consume 4 Charge Count on self to heal (Charge Count Consumed * 3) HP

3.description: After using a Combat Page: At 12+ Charge Count on self, and if this unit is below 75% HP, consume 4 Charge Count on self to heal (Charge Count Consumed * 4) HP and gain 2 Power Up next turn

1.description:
Turn Start: 2 random players gain +2 Charge Count next turn
Whenever a player uses a combat page, if that page was Sloth or Pride Affinity, apply +1 Charge Count next turn to all allies
Turn Start: If this unit has Charge and does not have Charge Barrier, gain 2 Charge Barrier next turn

2.description: Turn Start: If this unit has Charge and does not have Charge Barrier, gain 3 Charge Barrier next turn

3.description: Turn Start: If this unit has Charge and does not have Charge Barrier, gain 5 Charge Barrier next turn

1.description: Turn Start: Gain +3 Charge Count next turn
On Kill: If this unit has Charge, apply 5 Charge Count to all allies next turn

Turn Start: Gain (Charge Count / 7) Damage Up next turn
Turn Start: If this unit does not have Charge Barrier, gain 1 Charge Barrier

2.description:
Turn Start: Gain (Charge Count / 5) Damage Up next turn
Turn Start: If this unit does not have Charge Barrier, gain 1 Charge Barrier

3.description:
Turn Start: Gain (Charge Count / 5) Damage Up next turn
Turn Start: If this unit does not have Charge Barrier, gain 3 Charge Barrier

1.description: Turn Start: All allies gain 3 Charge Barrier
On Use: Units with Charge Count gain Max Dice Power +(Charge Count on self / 7). If the page used had a Light Cost of 3 or more, Dice Power +1

Turn Start: 1 random ally gains 3 Poise Potency
Clash Win: If the dice was Gloom Affinity, gain 3 Poise and 2 Poise Count

Turn Start: 1 ally with the highest Poise gains 1 Poise Count, 1 Haste and 1 Damage up next turn

Clash Win: If the ally with the highest Poise wins a Clash using a Lust Affinity Dice, they gain 1 Haste next turn (Max 2 times per turn)

2.description:
Turn Start: 1 ally with the highest Poise gains 2 Poise Count, 1 Haste and 1 Damage up next turn

Clash Win: If the ally with the highest Poise wins a Clash using a Lust Affinity Dice, they gain 1 Haste next turn (Max 3 times per turn)

3.description:
Turn Start: 1 ally with the highest Poise gains 2 Poise Count, 2 Haste and 2 Damage up next turn

Clash Win: If the ally with the highest Poise wins a Clash using a Lust Affinity Dice, they gain 1 Haste next turn (Max 3 times per turn)

1.description: Turn Start: 1 fastest ally gains 3 Poise Potency next turn. If they have 10+ Poise, draw 1 page
Encounter Start: All allies gain 4 Poise and +4 Poise Count

If this unit has Poise, gain 1 Clash Power Up
At 6+ Poise, gain 2 Clash Power up instead

Upon rolling a Pride Dice, apply 1 Poise and Poise Count next turn to a random ally (Max 10 times per turn)
Turn Start: At 3+ Pride Resonance, apply 2 Poise Potency and +2 Poise Count to all allies
On Crit: Gain 5 Poise Potency and 2 Poise Count next turn. If the Dice used to crit was Gluttony, gain 7 Poise Potency and 3 Poise Count instead (Max one times per turn)
On Gain Poise: Gain 1 Poise Potency and 1 Poise Count

Increases ally crit damage by +50%
On Crit: Gain 1 Clash Power Up next turn

2.description:
Increases ally crit damage by +100%
On Crit: Gain 3 Offense Level Up next turn

3.description:
Increases ally crit damage by +150%
On Crit: Gain 6 Offense Level Up next turn

1.description:
When applying Burn, inflict 1 Burn to 3 random enemies

At 3+ Wrath Resonance, inflict 5 Burn to all enemies

Encounter Start: For every enemy on the field, inflict 1 Burn Potency to all enemies.
On Hit: If the dice used was not Wrath affinity, inflict 1 Burn Potency to 2 random enemies

On Hit: If the dice used was Lust affinity, inflict 3 Burn Potency
When inflicting Burn, inflict 3 more Burn Potency

Turn Start: If this unit has 20+ Burn, double Burn on self

2.description:
On Hit: If the dice used was Lust affinity, inflict 4 Burn Potency
When inflicting Burn, inflict 4 more Burn Potency
Turn Start: If this unit has 15+ Burn, double Burn on self

3.description:
On Hit: If the dice used was Lust affinity, inflict 5 Burn Potency
When inflicting Burn, inflict 5 more Burn Potency
Turn Start: If this unit has 10+ Burn, double Burn on self

1.description: On Hit, 50% chance to inflict 1 bleed and 1 Bleed count
When hitting an enemy with a single Offensive dice page, inflict 1 Bleed and 2 Defense Level Down.
Turn Start: If all enemies have Bleed, all allies gain 1 Haste next turn and 2 Offense Level Up next turn

These effects only apply when using a Bleed page

On Clash Win: inflict Bleed Count equal to (# sum of dices on page - 1) (Max 5) If the target has over +10  Bleed Count, deal 3 Bonus Lust Damage on hit. (Max Twice per ally)
Skills that inflict Bleed or Bleed count gain +1 Clash Power
Turn Start: Enemies heal 5 HP

*Applies to the #1 deployment ally*

On Roll: Dice Power +2, but all allies gain +2 Sinking and Tremor Count (Max once per turn)
Clash Win: Inflict 3 Tremor Potency to target and self, then trigger Tremor Burst on target and self (Max once per turn)

Upon being Staggered, unstagger and heal 40 HP (Max once per encounter)

Applies to the #1 deployment ally

On Roll: +5 Dice Power to the target and to self. 
On Roll: Inflict +1 Bleed Count to target

**These effects only apply when using a "Bleed" or "Poise" Page.**

For every 10 Bleed on target, Dice Power +1 (Max 4)
For every 10 Poise on self, Min Dice Power +1 (Max 4)

On Crit: Inflict (Poise on self / 5) Bleed Potency, and (Poise on self / 10) Bleed Count (Max 4). 

When this unit inflicts Bleed, inflict an additional 2 Bleed Potency and 1 Count (Max once per turn)
Clash Win: Inflict Lust damage equal to Bleed on target, then lower Bleed Count on target by 2 (Max once per turn)

Max HP +50

On Hit: Deal damage to a random enemy equal to the damage dealt with this dice. (Max once per turn)

Turn Start: If this unit is Staggered, gain 2 Lust E.G.O Resources and 1 E.G.O Resource of 2 random other affinities, then heal 20 HP.
